errors.cause: Server not running or wrong port/host

solutions.code: curl http://localhost:3000/health  # Test server is up

// Verify URL in request is correct
// Common: localhost vs 127.0.0.1, http vs https, port number

errors.pattern: SSL certificate|CERT_|certificate verify failed|self signed certificate

solutions.code: Settings → General → SSL certificate verification → OFF
Settings → Certificates → CA Certificates → Add

Settings → Certificates → Client Certificates → Add
// Add PFX/PEM file

errors.cause: Server took too long to respond

solutions.code: Settings → General → Request timeout in ms → 60000

// In Pre-request Script:
pm.request.timeout = 120000;

// Postman desktop bypasses CORS
// CORS only applies to browser-based requests

// Add header: Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
// Or specific origin

// Install Postman Interceptor browser extension
// Captures cookies and bypasses some restrictions
Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}
Authorization tab → Type: OAuth 2.0 → Get New Access Token
{{api_key}} → Verify value in environment

errors.cause: Variable not defined in active environment

solutions.code:
// Click environment quick look (eye icon)
// Add: base_url = https://api.example.com

// Use environment dropdown in top-right
// Make sure correct env is selected

pm.environment.set('timestamp', Date.now());
pm.environment.set('uuid', require('uuid').v4());
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include('success');

errors.message: Invalid JSON in response or request

solutions.code: Content-Type: application/json

// Use Postman's JSON beautify
// Check for trailing commas, missing quotes

// Ensure dependent requests run first
// Use folder ordering or Run manually
Collection Runner → Delay: 500ms

errors.pattern: missing.*body|body required|request body cannot be empty

solutions.code: Body tab → form-data → key: file, value: (select file)
Body tab → x-www-form-urlencoded → key: value pairs

errors.cause: Issue running Postman collection via Newman

solutions.code: postman collection export --collection 'My Collection' --path ./collection.json
newman run collection.json -e environment.json

npm install -g newman@latest
newman --version
newman run collection.json -r cli,html --reporter-html-export report.html
